page.title: 03A Farmers Day.
page.content: I got up at 6:50 and went downstairs to get a cup of tea for me and my wife. Then I put a straw bale on the central heating boiler. I went across the yard to feed the pigs and clean them out. Then I went home for breakfast of egg, bacon and fried bread. I drove the tractor and sprayer around the field to spray the crops with weed-killer. Then I had my dinner - meat and vegatables, apple pie and custard. After this I cleaned out the sprayer before putting some fertilizer on the field of beans. I had to go back after my tea of sandwiches and cake to finish the field. I got back into the yard at 23:00, then went to bed, ready for another day.
